Description:
We are currently hiring our future Real Estate Agent:Providing expert advice: Deep understanding of the real estate market, including property trends, legal requirements, and financing options.
Able to provide expert advice to clients on buying, selling, or renting properties.
Achieve assigned revenue targets.
Source and increase the inventory stock of units including ownership information.
Source / generate leads by active networking and relationship building. Ensure good professional relationships with owners, developers and clients.
Ensure all leads and inquiries are attended to as per best customer service practices and follow up with clients on a regular basis.
Analyzing the local real estate market to identify potential properties for clients. This includes conducting market research, reviewing property listings, and evaluating property values.
Able to create attractive property listings that highlight the unique features of each property. This involves taking photographs, writing descriptions, and creating marketing materials.
Overall, He/ She is responsible for helping clients navigate the complex world of real estate. They must have a deep understanding of the market, be skilled negotiators, and provide excellent customer service to ensure that clients have a positive experience.If you meet the above qualifications and are interested in this position, please submit your resume. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applicants from all backgrounds.Please: Note that the position is based on commission only.Skills
Skills: ** URGENT- IMMEDIATE EMPLOYMENT- ALL NATIONALITIES WELCOMING BUT ONLY LIVING IN UAE **

Self-motivated, eager to learn, and a fast learner
Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to communicate effectively and persuade others.
Highly motivated to continuously learn and develop new skills, with a quick learning ability.
Proficient in managing time and organizing tasks efficiently.
Must be skilled in negotiating who can work with buyers and sellers to reach mutually beneficial agreements and able to negotiate contracts, review offers, and ensure that all legal requirements are met.
Additional languages would be an asset the preferable Russian, French, German, Arabic.
Must be responsive, professional, and committed to providing excellent customer service, able to answer client questions, address concerns, and provide regular updates throughout the buying, selling, or leasing process.
We need our future agent who wants to stay with us with a longtime and working hard with us.
